title: kaNDu nI sholla
sahitya:
kaNDu nI sholla vENDum sakhiyE kandanai mukundan maruganai ingu


anupallavi

  uNDiDavillai urangiDavillai uLLamE nondAl uttamanE enak-


caraNam    kAdalai eNNi karaindiDuginrAL kaN vizhi imaiyAmal kAttirukkinrAL
vEdanai koNDAL (murugA) vElarE en pAL viraivinanguDan varuvIr en pAl
